name: VIN
description: VIN is the native token unifying the $1T wine asset class on-chain. VIN is used by winemakers to purchase consumption data and customer acquisition data from consumers, and to enhance loyalty. VIN is also used to purchase data provided by a Decentralized Physical Infrastructure Network (DePIN), and to pay fees generated through Real World Asset (RWA) tokenization of wine and various DiFi activities tokenization enables.
